Self.Wiki: This map object represents an environmental map effect box in the map.

EnableDist.Wiki: Distance from camera required before enabling envmap. 0 = always enabled.

TransitionDist.Wiki: Distance it takes for an envmap to fully transition into view.

SpecularLightMult.Wiki: Strength of specular light in region.

PointLightMult.Wiki: Strength of direct light in region.

IsModifyLight.Wiki: Affects lighting with other fields when true. Possibly normalizes light when false.
